entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
